title: Toxic players and Baddies
body:
Seriously done with this game because all it has turned into is just toxic and stupid people, this is all i get now days
Can never get away from it and also with stipid people in ranked who just feed and flame you so stupid we are here to climb not to put up with people that are not willing do try,  Im not saying im the best player im just sick and fed up of this seriously.

replies.body:
Hey Noxis,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [Intentional Feeder Detection; Toxicity] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!

http://i.imgur.com/GszNGDD.png
either kill yourself to escape the inevitable pain or stfu, we all have to deal with it.
